DOC.brief_summary: This randomise control trial establish effect contraceptive intervention deliver mobile phone app instant messaging use effective contraception Bolivia . Woman age 16-24 randomised access Centro de Investigacion , Educacion Servicios 's sexual reproductive health app ( control ) app plus 0-3 instant message day 4 month ( intervention ) . Participants complete questionnaire baseline 4 month follow-up .
DOC.brief_title: An Intervention Delivered App Instant Messaging Increase Use Effective Contraception Among Young Women Bolivia
DOC.criteria: Aged 1624 Own personal Android mobile phone Live El Alto La Paz Bolivia Sexually active Not use pill , implant , injection , intrauterine device patch Want avoid pregnancy Can read Spanish
